item.description: To all you Irishmen and Wannabe Irishmen & Ladies join us in front of Peppercorns on Sunday March15th at noon for the annual St. Paddy's Day Parade....If you were planning on going anyway why not join all your friends at one spot and have a real Paahtie! Don't forget to wear your GREEN! To those wimps out there you can go into Peppercorns and get your HoT Toddy or use the Potty(for a fee of course!) See you there! This is crossposted with another meetup group
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be the only sober guy wearing GREEN
item.name: St. Patrick's Day Parade-Peppercorn's
